trends: There has been one other sighting in Waller
There were no other sightings in Waller on or around February 15th 2009
Summary: i saw a very large light in the sky it remained for an hour and a half
divs: Sighting Detailsi attended the drive in movie theater near wallwer tx at 7 pm sunday nite..after aprox. 1 hour i noticed a large ball of light in the western sky.. it lit up the sky,...it was a radiant light in the shape of a sphere but in the middle it was shaped like a crescent..the object didnt appear to be moving. i kept watchin it for approx 1 hour 20 min..i had went to the snack shack to get a coke and when i came out the light was gone...it wasnt a star ill tell u that. iwas at least 15 times brighter than any star in the sky...there were also commerical air planes in the sky. this was no plane
